import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FaFilm } from "react-icons/fa"; function BookTicket(props) { return (
{props.movieDetails && (

{props.movieDetails.name}

{props.movieDetails.desc}

Release Date: {props.movieDetails.releaseDate}
Average Rating : {props.movieDetails.avg_rating}
)}
How many Seats?
); } export default BookTicket;
